    Здравствуйте!
    Меня зовут Елена Кондрашева.
    Я врач-дерматолог и косметолог.

    Имея 20-летний практический опыт омоложения и лечения кожи, я приняла решение о создании собственной косметической марки. Со своей коман- дой биохимиков и технологов мне удалось разрабо- тать комплексную систему ухода, которая основана на базовых принципах омоложения кожи...

Профессиональная уходовая косметика Cosmomedica

BEFORE / AFTER application of cosmetics. Cosmomedica receives lots of positive feedback from our clients along with inspiring pictures of progress. These photographs show the effectiveness of our products against a range of issues: acne, pigmentation, allergies, deformation of the face shape and others. However, the results and effectiveness of skincare products are not guaranteed and depend on a number of factors, such as the case severity, consistency in following the skincare routine, diet and many other variable factors.

The results after cosmetics application may vary and can be achieved at a different time frame.Cosmomedica makes no representation or warranties of any kind, expressed or implied about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, or suitability with respect to the products, services, or related graphics contained on the website for any purpose. Any reliance or expectation is therefore strictly at the Client`s own risk.

Лучшие косметические средства по уходу за кожей

BEFORE / AFTER application of cosmetics. Cosmomedica receives lots of positive feedback from our clients along with inspiring pictures of progress. These photographs show the effectiveness of our products against a range of issues: acne, pigmentation, allergies, deformation of the face shape and others. However, the results and effectiveness of skincare products are not guaranteed and depend on a number of factors, such as the case severity, consistency in following the skincare routine, diet and many other variable factors.

The results after cosmetics application may vary and can be achieved at a different time frame.Cosmomedica makes no representation or warranties of any kind, expressed or implied about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, or suitability with respect to the products, services, or related graphics contained on the website for any purpose. Any reliance or expectation is therefore strictly at the Client`s own risk.
